snippet: Toyota Motor Corp is set to post record growth for the year just ended - with a likely $10 billion surge in operating profit - but the mood at its HQ in Japan's prosperous automotive heartland is cautious as executives warn of a leaner year ahead....

headline.print_headline: After Two Bumper Years, Toyota Braces for Shift to Slower Growth
headline.main: After Two Bumper Years, Toyota Braces for Shift to Slower Growth

lead_paragraph: Toyota Motor Corp is set to post record growth for the year just ended - with a likely $10 billion surge in operating profit - but the mood at its HQ in Japan's prosperous automotive heartland is cautious as executives warn of a leaner year ahead.
